page.title: 11A day at school 2
page.content: Mr Elliott said they could play in the assembly.Assembly was about jealousy. Mr Elliott told a story like if you are getting a new brother or sister you might get jealous because you think your Mum and Dad don't want you any more. At 12.00 Fiona went for her dinner, she had crisps, cheese sandwiches, Kit Kat and an apple and a drink of orange. At dinner play time Fiona had been fighting with Mandy.When she got in from play she got told off and had to say sorry to Mandy. Fiona read her poem out of a book called "Please Mrs Butler", and then wrote about it.At play time Fiona was pinched by Kevin Wain. It made a blue mark on her arm. Mr Elliott said he was not suprised.
